text: Anata gataga tsuma o ribetsu shi, sadame rareta kikan ga manryō shite sōhō no gōi no shita ni, datō ni hanashi ga matomattanaraba, ka no on'na-ra no kekkon o (mae no) otto wa samatagete wa naranai. Kore (oshie) wa, anata gata no naka arrā to saigo no hi o shinjiru mono e no kunkaidearu. Sore wa anata gata ni totte mottomo seijōdeari keppakudearu. Anata gata wa shiranai ga, arrā wa shitte ora reru
